statements: REVOKE SELECT ON iot_sensors FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON iot_sensors FROM user2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON iot_sensors FROM user3
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON sensors FROM user1
REVOKE DELETE ON sensor_data FROM user2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON sensors,sensor_data FROM user3
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLE sensors FROM user1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLE sensor_data FROM user2;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLE sensor_logs FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON sensors TO public;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON sensor_data TO public;
REVOKE DELETE ON locations TO public;
REVOKE SELECT, UPDATE ON sensor_data TO user1
REVOKE INSERT, DELETE ON sensor_location TO user2
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON sensor_type TO user3
